title: Some kind of barely Bauhaus-esque bubble typeface
author: blondebandit

comments.content:
It looks like **[September Heavy](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317141244/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/device/september/)** by Rian Hughes [Device, 2001]

PS: You are too fast for me Kevin :)
I'm used to getting beaten out by Mr. Pape and Mr. Evans, at least one of whom is retired. I've got to move fast to keep ahead of them....
